title: .matchAll()
description: The `.matchAll()` JS method returns an `Iterator` object of all matched results of a global regular expression in a string.
content: The method that returns an `Iterator` object of all matches of a string against a regular expression. It provides all matches, including capturing groups, when the regular expression has the global `g` flag. If the global flag is not present, `.matchAll()` will not work as expected.
